author: Mollie Russell
description:
The DnD Paladin 5e class is as durable as it is devout. Paladins excel on the frontlines, where they can smite foes and support friends with ease. Beyond the battlefield, their high Charisma and divine powers give them plenty of utility, too. This guide explains the 2014 rules for the Dungeons and Dragons Paladin and provides expert advice on playing a character of this class.

Continue reading DnD Paladin 5e class explained
MORE FROM WARGAMER: DnD 2024 Player's Handbook review, DnD classes guide, DnD races guide
title: DnD Paladin 5e class explained

author: Matt Bassil
description:
Magic: The Gathering is a trading card game where players build a unique deck and go head-to-head, summoning creatures and slinging spells until someone is eliminated. While its combos can get complex, learning how to play Magic: The Gathering doesn't have to be. This beginner-friendly guide breaks down the basic rules and setup into easy steps.

Continue reading How to play Magic: The Gathering for beginners
MORE FROM WARGAMER: All MTG sets in order, Upcoming MTG release dates, How to play MTG
title: How to play Magic: The Gathering for beginners

author: Matt Bassil
description:
A new Japanese Pokémon set called Inferno X has been confirmed by Pokebeach. According to the site, this release will center around Mega Charizard X and will release in Japan on September 26, 2025. This would make it the second Mega Evolution series expansion after the paired sets Mega Brave and Mega Symphonia, which are expected in August.

Continue reading New Pokémon set features the TCG's first Mega Charizard X in 10 years
MORE FROM WARGAMER: Best Pokémon cards, Rare Pokémon cards, All Pokémon sets in order
title: New Pokémon set features the TCG's first Mega Charizard X in 10 years

author: Alex Evans
description:
I've just finished watching the predictably excellent Star Wars: Andor Season 2 and, while it features my #1 Empire crush - heartless, venal worm in a cape Orson Krennic - the story ended without a glimpse of his deadly spherical brainchild, the Death Star. I'll be re-watch Rogue One to get my giant death ball fix. But I've spotted another option, with not one but two balls I can hold in my hands: the infamous, long playing strategy board game Star Wars Rebellion has just gone to 20% discount on Amazon.

Continue reading Get 20% off a Star Wars tabletop game with epic strategy (and both Death Stars)
MORE FROM WARGAMER: Best board games , Couples' board games, Boar
title: Get 20% off a Star Wars tabletop game with epic strategy (and both Death Stars)

author: Mollie Russell
description:
A swanky, cocktail-themed board game called Murder on the Rocks hit Kickstarter on May 20, and it looks like a unique new take on the social deduction genre. The self-described “crime-solving party game” combines the limited communication of Mysterium with your standard hidden killer schtick. This cocktail of mechanics is packaged in a cocktail shaker, inside of which you’ll find gorgeous cards and droppers for drink mixing.

Continue reading Stylish new board game is an intoxicating cocktail of Werewolf and Mysterium
MORE FROM WARGAMER: Best board games, Best board games for adults, Best murder mystery board games
title: Stylish new board game is an intoxicating cocktail of Werewolf and Mysterium

author: Mollie Russell
description:
Dungeons and Dragons rival Daggerheart was released on May 20 by Darrington Press, but by May 21, the Critical Role publishing house has already shared new playtest material. A new website called ‘The Void’ appeared on Daggerheart’s release day, and it contained early rules for a Warlock and Fighter class.

Continue reading DnD rival Daggerheart just released, and it's already playtesting new classes
MORE FROM WARGAMER: Critical Role campaign 3 cast, episodes, DnD classes, Critical Role cast and characters guide
title: DnD rival Daggerheart just released, and it's already playtesting new classes

author: Matt Bassil
description:
The Magic: The Gathering card Sygg River Cutthroat has risen in value over the past week. The cheapest version, from the Zendikar Rising commander precons, has leapt from $2 on May 12 to $8 on May 25, according to the price tracker on MTGGoldfish.

Continue reading Old merfolk MTG card that makes a great precon upgrade sees 300% price spike
MORE FROM WARGAMER: All MTG sets in order, Upcoming MTG release dates, How to play MTG
title: Old merfolk MTG card that makes a great precon upgrade sees 300% price spike

author: Timothy Linward
description:
Reader, the censored photograph at the top of this article isn’t just bait - if we put an unblurred image of the hideous conversion that European model maker Barbarus has created, we'd genuinely risk getting this article shadow-banned from search engines and social media. If you like your Warhammer 40,000 as grim and dark as possible, read on to find out how he created it.

Continue reading We've found it - the most cursed Warhammer 40k conversion ever
MORE FROM WARGAMER: Best Warhammer 40k starter sets, Best Warhammer 40k games, All Warhammer 40k factions
title: We've found it - the most cursed Warhammer 40k conversion ever
